comments.text:
> http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.locale

What are the grounds of this URL? Looks like it always redirects to <http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.en> (I tested it with Japanese Firefox on Japanese Windows via Japanese ISP).

I think reporter's intention was that <https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/foundation/licensing/website-content/> should link to <http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.en>, <https://www.mozilla.org/ja/foundation/licensing/website-content/> (if present) should link to <http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.ja>, and so on. Unfortunately the reporter is away as of now.
